string.body: Trainee Scout;A Lepharist guarding a small campsite on [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_B]. When they have no particular duties, they enjoy making soup from the Longhorn Abex near their camp.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LehparKnight_33_An
string.body: Scout Fighter;A fighter in charge of training the scout trainees on [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_B]. They maintain a state of constant vigilance.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Cherubim3_32_An
string.body: Kerubiel Sentinel;A kind of Kerubiel that can be seen in near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D1]. There is a theory that they were once Kerubs, but a drastic mutation has transformed them into their current form.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Cherubim3_34_An
string.body: Kerubiel Patrol;Patrols guarding the Kerubiel dens scattered around the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D2]. They have what appear to be vestigial wings, so scholar have suggested that they may once have been able to fly.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Cherubim4_33_An
string.body: Kerubiel Bandit;Violent Kerubiels that can be seen in the Kerubiel dens scattered around the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D2]. One of the most widespread theories about the traces of wings on their backs is that they are still evolving.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_BasiliskRe_33_An
string.body: Red Spotted basilisk;A Basilisk living in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D2]. Why this creature, which crackles with fire energy, came to be in a marsh is one of Aion's little mysteries.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_ClodwormRe_33_An
string.body: Black Spotted Clodworm;A creature that can be seen in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D2]. Most people go to great lengths to avoid these creatures.

string.body: Lumbering Agrint;A tree monster living in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D3]. Its attacks are known to sting ferociously.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Rottentree_34_An
string.body: Greenclaw Rotron;A mutant creature in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D3]. Its mossy claws only look cuddly--they could take the head off a Shulack.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Zombie_34_An
string.body: Sluggish Zombie;A zombie in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D3]. It has a nasty infectious bite, which can cause the bitten creature to become a zombie.

string.body: Blind Keraton;A mysterious creature living in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D4]. People call them Blind Keraton because they are born without eyes.

string.body: Sawmane Frillneck;A Frillneck living in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_C1]. An aggressive species, they often attack on sight.

string.body: Miserly Iscraw;A vengeful spirit that is said to appear at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D5]. It is said that the farm owner Iscraw, who was very miserly, tortures the spirits of his tenants even after death.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Banshee_37_An
string.body: Sobbing Banshee;A ghost known to appear at night around the collapsed house at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D5]. The horror that has bound her spirit there as a ghost also made her hair stand on end like blades.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Bookie_37_An
string.body: Ragged Boggart;A Boggart that appears frequently behind the wall of the collapsed house near [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D5].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Skeleton_37_An
string.body: Anubite Looter;One of the ghosts at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D5]. Despite its form, the blade it wields still has bite.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Zombie_36_An
string.body: Rotten Zombie;A zombie that can only crawl on the ground because its legs are rotten. There are plenty of them at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D5].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Rottentree_34_An_2
string.body: Greenclaw Rotron;It seems to be a kind of monster that have mutated from the rotten old tree in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D3].

string.body: Severed Gnarl;A small tree monster in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D7]. It is said to have been born from a snapped Agrint branch.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_SlimeRE_36_An
string.body: Sticky Slime;A contaminated creature that can be seen in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D7]. Don't get it in your hair.

string.body: Goldenback Arachna;An Arachna in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D7]. Its legs are deceptively strong weapons.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LF2A_BATyellow_49_An
string.body: Cave Bloodwing;A Bloodwing living in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2B_SZ_D]. Bloodwings are actually mammals that hate Aetheric light, and used to live inside caves before they became mutated.

string.body: Venomthorn Laupede;A Laupede seen commonly at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2B_SZ_D]. Many types of Laupedes have poisonous saliva, but the Laupedes found at the Spring instead carry venom in their needle-like legs.

string.body: Leowasp Peon;Although this insectlike creature is at the bottom of their hive-like hierarchy, it's eager to defend its territory.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A1_SpakyButterfly_56_n
string.body: Poisonscale Moskie;A Moskie growing in the northern grassland of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A1]. Its poison powder causes serious headaches.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A1_Fungy_Flower_56_n
string.body: Seedleaf Fungie;A Fungie growing in the grassland of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A1]. The Reian Tribe often uses this nutritious Fungie as a food ingredient.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A1_Rafflesia_DR_56_An
string.body: Apivorous Malodor;A Malodor growing in the grassland of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A1]. It lures prey with its sweet fragrance.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A1_Lobster_DR_56_An
string.body: Highstrike Spiner;A Spiner inhabiting the eastern desert area of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A1].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A1_Scorpion_Rough_56_An
string.body: Charback Scolopen;A Scolopen inhabiting the eastern desert area of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A1]. It has deadly poison.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A1_Condor_DR_56_An
string.body: Molten Gryphu;It is believed that watercolor flyer's feathers are specifically adapted to keeping this Gryphu cool in the hottest environments.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A1_Shadowstalker_Leaf_56_An
string.body: Vengeful Excura;An Excura that appears in the west of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A1]. It is often found in a shady place.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A1_SalivadoRed_56_An
string.body: Bristlewhisker Hornskull;A Hornskull living in the desert area of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A1]. It often attacks refugees passing through the desert.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A1_Fellial_DR_56_An
string.body: Gravel Moonflower;A plant growing in the desert of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A1]. It lures prey with its beauty and attacks them mercilessly.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A1_Brax_DR_56_n
string.body: Plainsgrazer Brax;A Brax living in the grassland of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A1]. Usually docile, its hooves are well-suited to self-defense.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A1_FennecFox_Nmd_56_n
string.body: Rajalf the Cunning;A Nojolf that attacks only wounded refugees. He never challenges anyone stronger.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_FennecFox_N_Nmd_56_An
string.body: Gavijolf the Gouger;Attacks refugees and travelers under the cover of darkness. His main targets are children and old men.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A1_SalivadoRed_Nmd_56_Ae
string.body: Insidious Barolf;A Hornskull notorious for its brutality. It has a shining red tail.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A1_Brax_DR_Nmd_56_n
string.body: Gabo the Obstinate;The head of the Plainsgrazer Brax pack. Its territory is ten times larger than that of a normal Brax.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A1_SpakyButterfly_Nmd_56_n
string.body: Queen Maphis;The queen of Moskies, she spreads a poisonous pollen tinged with red.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A2_DragonFly_57_An
string.body: Leowasp Looter;A Leowasp that romps in the farming field to the west of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A2_01] and works in the service of the Balaur.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A2_SpakyButterfly_57_n
string.body: Deadly Poisonscale Moskie;A Moskie inhabiting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A2]. It spreads deadly poisonous powder.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A2_Fungy_Flower_57_n
string.body: Poisonroot Fungie;A Fungie inhabiting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A2] and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A2_08_new]. Many people mistake it for [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A1_Fungy_Flower_56_n] and end up being poisoned by its roots.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A2_mammoth_DR_baby_56_n
string.body: Baby Trepone Mamut;[%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A2_mammoth_DR_57_An]'s baby. It is as gluttonous as its mother.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A2_mammoth_DR_57_An
string.body: Trepone Mamut;A Mamut inhabiting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A2]. The Reian Tribe has been hunting it for its soft, juicy meat.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A2_Sheluk_Worm_57_An
string.body: Deadly Poisonbarb Sheluk;A Sheluk living in the north of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A2]. There is no known antidote to its poison.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A2_Mosbear_DR_56_An
string.body: Ferocious Mosbear;A Mosbear inhabiting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A2], it uses its massive shoulders to knock down its prey.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A2_Brax_DR_57_n
string.body: Crookhorn Brax;Though usually docile, those horns will quickly drop its attackers to the ground.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A2_ShulackRa_57_An
string.body: Shulack Searcher;A Shulack occupying the area including [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A2_04] and the Destroyed Reian Village.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A2_IronGolem_57_An
string.body: Marabata Scout;A Marabata dispatched by Shulacks to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A2_02]. It is of low intelligence; you might be able to avoid its notice.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A2_ShulackFi_Nmd_57_Ae
string.body: Captain Babelkin;A Shulack known to have never failed to find his target. He is very tenacious, and dressed to impress!

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A2_DragonFly_Nmd_57_An
string.body: Ironjaw Tarapu;The leader of the Leowasp looters, it doesn't seem to be very powerful or intelligent.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A2_Sheluk_Worm_Nmd_57_An
string.body: Venomous Geruk;It is said that a drop of its poison can kill 10 Mamuts.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A2_IronGolem_Nmd_57_An
string.body: Kugen the Ravager;A weapon developed as a part of a contingency plan.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A2_Daru_DR_Nmd_57_n
string.body: Careful Peruru;A Daru that never lowers its guard. It unerringly finds the weak spot of its enemies.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_mammoth_DR_baby_56_n
string.body: Baby Cucutero Mamut;This baby Mamut likes to play with its food.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_mammoth_DR_57_An
string.body: Cucutero Mamut;Ever watchful of its little ones, this Mamut will not tolerate trespassers.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_Dionae_DR_57_An
string.body: Delirium Dionae;A Dionae inhabiting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A3]. Its patterns are hallucinogenic.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B1_Daru_DR_58_n
string.body: Grayhoof Daru;A Daru settled in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B1]. It is fiercer than it looks.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_Agrint_DR_57_An
string.body: Gnarled Rotron;A Rotron growing on the fertile soil of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B1].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_Mosbear_DR_57_An
string.body: Merciless Mosbear;Although smaller than its ferocious cousin, its affinity with the earth makes it just as dangerous.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_Sheluk_Worm_57_An
string.body: Venomtip Sheluk;A Sheluk inhabiting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A3]. Its poison paralyzes the nerves.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_Owllau_Fi_57_An
string.body: Strigik Fighter;A Strigik guarding [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A3_03]. It is a lesser warrior of the Urugugu Tribe.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_Owllau_As_57_An
string.body: Strigik Scouter;A Strigik guarding [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A3_03]. It is a lesser scout of the Urugugu Tribe.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_Owllau_Pr_57_An
string.body: Strigik Healer;A Strigik guarding [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A3_03]. It is a lesser soldier of the Urugugu Tribe.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_Lupyllini_DR_56_n
string.body: Periwinkle Pluma;A Pluma living by the water of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A3_03]. Its reddish feathers are widely used as accessories.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_Owllau_pet_57_Ae
string.body: Urugugu Guardian Spirit;A Spirit protecting the Urugugu Tribe.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_Owllau_Fi_57_Ae
string.body: Elite Strigik Fighter;A Strigik in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A3_04]. It is an elite soldier of the Urugugu Tribe.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_Owllau_As_57_Ae
string.body: Elite Strigik Assassin;A Strigik in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A3_04]. It is an elite soldier of the Urugugu Tribe.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_Owllau_Pr_57_Ae
string.body: Elite Strigik Healer;A Strigik in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A3_04]. It is an elite soldier of the Urugugu Tribe.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_Owllau_Wi_57_Ae
string.body: Elite Strigik Shaman;A Strigik in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A3_04]. It is an elite soldier of the Urugugu Tribe.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_Owllau_El_57_Ae
string.body: Elite Strigik Summoner;A Strigik in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A3_04]. It is an elite soldier of the Urugugu Tribe.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_Owllau_Fi_57_Nmd_An
string.body: Sergeant Gutu;The most elite fighter of the Urugugu tribe. He is now devoted to training young tribal warriors.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_Owllau_As_57_Nmd_Ae
string.body: Lutau the Slayer;An legendary assassin famed for moving in absolute silence.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_Owllau_Pr_57_Nmd_Ae
string.body: Prophet Huruhuru;A priest who foresees the future of the Urugugu Tribe. He manages all tribal matters.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_Owllau_Wi_57_Nmd_Ae
string.body: Fortuneteller Lusupa;The best fortuneteller of the Urugugu Tribe. Based on his knowledge of nature, he uses the most powerful magic among his tribesmen.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_Owllau_El_57_Nmd_Ah
string.body: Deputy Chieftain Aruru;A Urugugu tribesman helping Great Chieftain Zakufu to lead the tribe. He is in charge of maintaining contact between Spirits and the Urugugu Tribe.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_Owllauchief_Nmd_57_Ah
string.body: Great Chieftain Zakufu;The great chieftain named by the oracle. No one dares challenge his authority, which was bestowed upon him by god.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_FennecFox_56_n
string.body: Feral Nojolf;A Nojolf living in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A1_04]. It seems mostly harmless... until nightfall.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_FennecFox_N_56_An
string.body: Rabid Nojofar; A transformed Nojolf that has absorbed the energy of night. It is particularly dangerous.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_Fellial_DR_56_An
string.body: Sandtrap Moonflower;A Moonflower inhabiting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A1_04]. Its shell is as hard as rock and makes it almost impenetrable.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_SandShark_57_An
string.body: Desert Zanthay;A Zanthay in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B2] desert area.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_Lobster_DR_57_An
string.body: Sharpstrike Spiner;A Spiner roaming [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A1_04]. It poses a great threat to refugees.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_Worm_Oasis_56_An
string.body: Carnivorous Ampha;A creature that attacks everyone it sees. It inhabits the oasis area of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A1].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_Warg_DR_57_An
string.body: Ferocious Warg;A Warg wandering around the desert area of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A1].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_Condor_DR_57_An
string.body: Scavenger Gryphu;Although it prefers picking at carrion, this aggressive Gryphu is equally pleased to hunt live prey.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_DragonSnake_57_An
string.body: Sand Swamp Serrator;This Serrator is particularly well suited to its environment.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_ShadowStalker_Sand_57_An
string.body: Detritus Obscura;Sand, dirt, bits of bone--this Obscura picks up anything it encounters.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_SalivadoRed_57_An
string.body: Needlebeard Hornskull;A Hornskull inhabiting the desert area of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A1].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_Tog_57_An
string.body: Rabid Tog;A Tog raised by the Humnaz Tribe as an aggressive fighter with a savage bite.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_CalydonFi_57_An
string.body: Humnaz Sentry;A Calydon soldier guarding [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A4_03]. It sniffs out enemies and pursues them without mercy.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_CalydonAs_57_An
string.body: Humnaz Thief;A Calydon soldier guarding [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A4_03]. It often uses vile tricks to gain an upper paw with its adversaries.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_CalydonWi_57_An
string.body: Humnaz Shaman;A Calydon soldier guarding [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A4_03]. It uses vile spells and clever illusions.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_Tog_57_Ae
string.body: Tamed Tog;A Tog raised by Humnaz Tribe. It is well trained and often performs better than an ordinary warrior.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_CalydonFi_57_Ae
string.body: Elite Humnaz Warrior;A Calydon elite soldier stationed in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A4_04]. It is an excellent axe-wielder.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_CalydonAs_57_Ae
string.body: Elite Humnaz Assassin;A Calydon elite soldier stationed in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A4_04]. It is an excellent assassin.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_CalydonWi_57_Ae
string.body: Elite Humnaz Shaman;A Calydon elite soldier stationed in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A4_04]. It uses high-grade spells.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_CalydonRa_57_Ae
string.body: Elite Humnaz Bowman;A Calydon elite soldier stationed in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A4_04]. It uses a bow proficiently.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_CalydonPr_57_Ae
string.body: Elite Humnaz Supplicator;A Calydon elite soldier stationed in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A4_04]. It uses high-grade healing magic.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_CalydonFi_57_Nmd_An
string.body: Chieftain Candidate Budugum;A young Calydon harboring an ambition to become the chieftain of the Humnaz Tribe. He has already lost twice to Haridoo but hasn't given up on his dreams.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_CalydonAs_57_Nmd_Ae
string.body: Shadowstrike Gubacha;A troublemaker within the Humnaz Tribe. Once battle starts, he kills everyone, including his allies.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_CalydonWi_57_Nmd_Ae
string.body: Dumuch Faithhealer;A Calydon of Humnaz Tribe, who uses powerful magic based on his profound faith. He oversees all rituals and enjoys the full confidence of his tribesmen.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_CalydonRa_57_Nmd_Ae
string.body: Clairvoyant Sunachu;The best marksman the Humnaz Tribe has ever had, it is thought that he can see around corners. He is known to hit the tail feather of a flying bird.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_CalydonPr_57_Nmd_Ah
string.body: Chaburat the Noble;A direct descendent of Shantuku, the first chieftain of Humnaz Tribe. He and Haridoo are at odds with each other.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_Calydonchief_Nmd_57_Ah
string.body: Chieftain Haridoo;The chieftain of the Humnaz Tribe who has power matching his noble blood. Many chieftain candidates have knelt at his feet.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B1_Fungy_Flower_58_n
string.body: Thornhair Fungie;This playful, intelligent Fungie is rather dangerous when attacked.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B1_Octaside_leaf_58_An
string.body: Thornleaf Arachna;An Arachna inhabiting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B1]. Its protective coloring makes it inconspicuous.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B1_Octaside_leaf_R_58_An
string.body: Needlespine Arachna;An Arachna inhabiting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B1]. Its protective coloring makes it inconspicuous.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B1_Mosbear_DR_58_An
string.body: Lunatic Mosbear;A Mosbear inhabiting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B1]. It is very aggressive.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B1_BrohumBFi_58_An
string.body: Brohie Fighter;A young Brohum of the Aponos Tribe.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B1_BrohumGRa_58_An
string.body: Brohie Archer;A young Brohum of the Aponos Tribe.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B1_BrohumMFi_58_An
string.body: Brohum Fighter;A fighter of the Aponos Tribe guarding [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B1_05].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B1_BrohumFRa_58_An
string.body: Brohum Archer;A bowman of the Aponos Tribe guarding [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B1_05].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B1_Mosbear_DR_Nmd_58_An
string.body: Vanuka the Earthshaker;Among the strongest of its species, it is said that it has never lost in vicious turf wars among Mosbears.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B1_ElementalLightM_Nmd_58_Ae
string.body: Spirit of Tranquility;A Spirit that looks sick of prittle-prattle.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B1_ElementalLightF_Nmd_58_An
string.body: Spirit of Silence;A Spirit who loves both making things silent and being silent.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B1_Octaside_leaf_Nmd_58_An
string.body: Apona the Cultivator;An Arachna powerful enough to protect itself without protective coloring. Its loud color warns you of its power.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B1_BrohumGRa_Nmd_58_Ae
string.body: Haughty Kirke;Pretty in pink and deadly with a bow, Kirke's arrows follow you to your grave.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B2_FennecFox_57_n
string.body: Gritpaw Nojolf;A Nojolf wandering around the desert area of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B2]. It becomes fierce at night.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B2_FennecFox_N_57_An
string.body: Gritclaw Nojofar;Refers to [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B2_FennecFox_57_n] that becomes violent at night.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B2_Bighands_58_An
string.body: Meandering Tyrhund;A Tyrhund roaming the desert area of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B2].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B2_Bighands_R_58_An
string.body: Shattered Tyrhund;A Tyrhund roaming the desert area of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B2].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B2_Fellial_DR_58_An
string.body: Sandsifter Moonflower;A Moonflower inhabiting the desert area of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B2]. Its incredibly long tail allows it to survive in the sand without any problem.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B2_SandShark_58_An
string.body: Sandstorm Zanthay;A Zanthay floating in the desert area of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B2].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B2_Merdion_DR_58_n
string.body: Rockscale Snuffler;Will be deleted soon.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B2_Lobster_DR_58_An
string.body: Relic Spiner;A Spiner living in the desert area of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B2].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B2_DragonSnake_58_An
string.body: Desert Serrator;A particularly aggressive Serrator with beautiful, flame-colored spines.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B2_SalivadoRed_58_An
string.body: Parched Hornskull;A Hornskull living in the desert area of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B2], it displays an unending appetite.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B2_Warg_DR_58_An
string.body: Ferocious Warg;A Warg wandering around the desert area of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A1].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B2_Komade_cristal_58_Ae
string.body: Komad Worker;A Komad laboring in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B2_09].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B2_Silika_cristal_58_Ae
string.body: Noble Orkanimum;An Orkanimum wandering around [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B2_09]. Strangely, Jotuns don't sense its presence.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B2_Millipede_Cristal_57_An
string.body: Glossy Wriggot;This Wriggot's crystalline edges carry a weakening poison.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B2_Nepilim_M1_58_Ae
string.body: Jotun Blacksmith;A Jotun belonging to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B2_09]. Although maddened by Aether energy, he has still incomparable refining skills.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B2_Nepilim_M2_58_Ae
string.body: Jotun Sculptor;A Jotun belonging to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B2_09]. Although maddened by Aether energy, he has still incomparable carving skills.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B2_Nepilim_R_58_Ae
string.body: Jotun Handicrafter;A Jotun belonging to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B2_09]. Although maddened by Aether energy, he has still incomparable workmanship.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B2_Bighands_Nmd_58_An
string.body: Grasping Shivhum;An extraordinarily gigantic Tyrhund. It has a grip strong enough to break a rock.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B2_Lobster_DR_Nmd_58_An
string.body: Teftak the Frenzied;A Spiner with loud, provocative coloring. It is hysterically excited at all times.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B2_Shulack_graverobber_Nmd_58_Ae
string.body: Trickster Pabarakin;A Shulack belonging to the Nightshade Clan. It uses any means to make money.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B2_Komade_cristal_Nmd_58_Ah
string.body: Nemeco the Dancer;It is known to absorb the essence of all living creatures at once. Little is known about it because no one has come back alive after encountering Nemeco.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B2_Nepilim_M1_Nmd_58_Ah
string.body: Munarim the Hobbler;A Jotun of Debarim Studio. He can work far more efficiently than other blacksmiths.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B2_Nepilim_M2_Nmd_58_Ah
string.body: Nubale the Glacier;The one in charge of petrifying Debarim when it gets out of control.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B2_Nepilim_R_Nmd_58_Ah
string.body: Hakur Stonebraid;A Jotun of Debarim Studio. He has more authority than other Jotuns.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B2_Nepilim_M1_Nmd_58_Ah_2
string.body: Daturum Wreckhelm;A Jotun disaffected with Debarim the Omnipotent.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B2_Nepilim_M2_Nmd_58_Ah_2
string.body: Zakul Deadeye;A Jotun of Debarim Studio. All Jotuns are very strong, but none of them can match Zakul in physical strength.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B2_Nepilim_R_Nmd_58_Ah_2
string.body: Mankur the Elusive;A Jotun of the Debarim Studio who never rests. This workaholic is a favorite with Debarim.
